lead_paragraph: MAINE--John D.,Jr., "Jordie" of Philadelphia, PA passed away on February 23rd of acute myeloid leukemia. He was 54 years of age, and leaves behind a loving wife, Deborah Emery, and three children, Emery, Jack and Libbie. Larger than life in so many ways, Jordie's legacy will be one of loyalty, hard work, generosity, and a profound love for his family. His presence was large, his heart was larger, and his zeal for life contagious. Of his many gifts, his greatest was his ability to connect with people; he built strong relationships and he made people feel important. He was loved by so many and will be missed greatly. A Memorial Service is to be held Thursday March 3rd at 2pm at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in Chestnut Hill, PA. In lieu of flowers, the family asks that gifts be directed to Springside Chestnut Hill Academy in memory of Jordie. 1/3
